title: Champions Cup Draw Announced
subtitle: Top 8 fighters set to compete in knockout tournament
blurb: The inaugural Champions Cup will feature the world's elite fighters in a single-elimination format starting June 15th.
content:
The much-anticipated Champions Cup draw has been announced, featuring eight of the world's top-ranked fighters competing in a knockout tournament format.

The preliminary round will see Alex Thunder take on Marcus Steel in what promises to be an explosive rematch of their recent IFC encounter. Other notable matchups include rising star Jake 'The Hammer' Rodriguez facing veteran grappler Carlos 'The Snake' Silva.

The tournament structure includes three rounds: Preliminary, Semi-finals, and Finals, with each fight carrying significant prize money and ranking points. The winner will take home â‚¬100,000 and secure their place in MMA history.

Fighters have been selected based on their current global rankings and recent performance across all competitions. The tournament is expected to be the most competitive event of the year.
